name: ./dist/README.md

content:
{
  "name": "reflexor",
  "version": "1.2.0",
  "description": "A lightweight reactive state library with optional persistence.",
  "main": "dist/cjs/reflexor.min.js",
  "module": "dist/es/reflexor.min.js",
  "browser": "dist/umd/reflexor.min.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "keywords": [
    "reactive",
    "state-management",
    "library"
  ],
  "author": "Michael Lavigna <michael.lavigna@hotmail.it>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/lavv425/reflexor"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "README.md"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "clean": "rm -rf dist"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=14"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@rollup/plugin-typescript": "^12.1.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.9.0",
    "@types/requirejs": "^2.1.37",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "rollup": "^2.79.2",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^7.0.2",
    "tslib": "^2.8.1",
    "typescript": "^5.6.3"
  }
}
name: package.json
